long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Illiad makes learning and remembering information intuitive.

Transform Pages into a Personal Library of Knowledge:
Discover the full potential of every webpage you visit with Illiad. Transform any page of text into a dynamic library of knowledge. Highlight terms you're unfamiliar with, chat in real-time with any document or webpage, and save important information into a personalized, AI-powered knowledgebase. 

Instant Context for Every Page:
With Illiad, you can dive deeper into any content you're reading in Chrome with just a simple highlight. Get instant explanations, definitions, and context for any term or phrase.

Engage with Content Like Never Before:
Ever wished you could ask the author a question directly? Illiad allows you to chat with content in real-time, asking detailed questions about what you're reading as if you're talking to the author. 

Seamlessly Save Content as You Read:
Illiad integrates smoothly into your browsing experience, allowing you to save any content with a simple click. Whether it's an insightful article, a research paper, or a captivating blog post, saving it is only a click away. Each piece of content you save becomes a part of your ever-growing library of knowledge.

Chat with Your Growing Knowledgebase:
As soon as you save something with Illiad, it becomes a living part of your knowledgebase. You're not just saving pages; you're building a reservoir of knowledge that evolves with you. Chat with your personalized AI assistant about saved pages, asking questions, seeking summaries, or exploring topics in-depth.
